alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Major; Roger Mills; Washita; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:52AM CDT until July 07 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WASHITA...SOUTHEASTERN ROGER MILLS...CUSTER... BLAINE...DEWEY...SOUTHWESTERN MAJOR...NORTHEASTERN BECKHAM AND SOUTHEASTERN WOODWARD COUNTIES... At 552 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of Orion to 3 miles northwest of Fay to 3 miles northwest of Foss Reservoir, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Seiling Mesonet site reported a 68 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Weatherford, Clinton, Watonga, Fairview, Taloga, Burns Flat, Geary, Thomas, Hydro, Seiling, Arapaho, Canton, Hammon, Canute, Leedey, Custer City, Butler, Longdale, and Foss. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Major; Roger Mills; Washita; Woodward
